tr.td: ▪ Testing and counseling for HIV in all patients with TB. ▪ Intensified case finding for TB in HIV-infected patients. ▪ Isoniazid preventative therapy (IPT) for HIV-positive patients that screen TB negative. ▪ ART initiation for all TB-HIV co-infected patients. ▪ Cotrimoxazole therapy for TB-HIV co-infected patients. ▪ Enhanced retention in care strategies including the post-test counseling and use of community-based outreach workers. ▪ Enhanced ART and TB treatment adherence strategies including the use of community care workers for adherence support and community-based management of selected patients. ▪ A fully integrated data management system—adopting the approach of one patient, one appointment, one file, and one data management system.
